channel.title: Replicability on Yet Another Geographer
channel.description: Recent content in Replicability on Yet Another Geographer

item.title: Puzzles about (mis)Replication
item.description: So, a while back, I was using a new compactness metric to extend some gerrymandering studies. In attempting the replication, I found some minor math errors in the original paper that made it diffcult to get valid values for the statistic. After trying multiple times to verify whether it was my code or if the published statistic had some typographical error, I went to the original author, shared my concerns, and found that it did.
